fileheader.author: Aeromatic / Jon Berndt / DATCOM / Hal V. Engel
fileheader.note:
This model was created using publicly available data, publicly available technical reports, textbooks, and guesses. It contains no proprietary or restricted data. If this model has been validated at all, it would be only to the extent that it seems to "fly right", and that it possibly complies with published, publicly known, performance data (maximum speed, endurance, etc.). Thus, this model is meant for educational and entertainment purposes only.
This simulation model is not endorsed by the manufacturer. This model is not to be sold.
